Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity of Novel Cationic Peptides against Clinical Isolates of Multi-Drug Resistant Staphylococcus pseudintermedius from Infected Dogs.
Literature.Author: Mohamed MF, Hammac GK, Guptill L, Seleem MN

Literature.Title: Targeting methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus with short salt-resistant synthetic peptides.
Literature.Author: Mohamed MF, Hamed MI, Panitch A, Seleem MN

Literature.Title: A short D-enantiomeric antimicrobial peptide with potent immunomodulatory and antibiofilm activity against multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Mohamed MF, Brezden A, Mohammad H, Chmielewski J, Seleem MN

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:IC50=64 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=128 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MIC50=1µM),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius(MIC90=2µM),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius SP3(MIC50=1µM),Staphylococcus pseudintermedius SP3(MIC90=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 72(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 200(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-44(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 19(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus VRSA1(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NRS 101(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=4µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9721(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-1744(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 35032(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25619(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NR-9667(MIC=4µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NR-13375(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1109(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1125(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 16011(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1017(MIC=32µM)
